info.title: CloudFlare Zone Settings API
info.description: The API for managing CloudFlare Zone Settings

get.summary: Available settings for your user in relation to a zone
get.description: Available settings for your user in relation to a zone

patch.summary: Edit settings for a zone
patch.description: Edit settings for a zone

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: One or more zone setting objects. Must contain an ID and a value.tttttttttttttt[{id:always_online,value:on},{id:browser_cache_ttl,value:18000},{id:ip_geolocation,value:off}]

parameters.name: X-AUTH-EMAIL
parameters.description: Email address associated with your account

parameters.name: X-AUTH-KEY
parameters.description: API key generated on the My Account page

get.summary: Automatically redirect visitors on mobile devices to a mobile-optimized subdomain
get.description: Automatically redirect visitors on mobile devices to a mobile-optimized subdomain

patch.summary: Automatically redirect visitors on mobile devices to a mobile-optimized subdomain
patch.description: Automatically redirect visitors on mobile devices to a mobile-optimized subdomain

parameters.name: mobile_subdomain
parameters.description: Which subdomain prefix you wish to redirect visitors on mobile devices to (subdomain must already exist).ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttm

parameters.name: strip_uri
parameters.description: Whether to drop the current page path and redirect to the mobile subdomain URL root or to keep the path and redirect to the same page on the mobile subdomainttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttfalse

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value of the zone settingtttttttttttttt{status:off,mobile_subdomain:m,strip_uri:false}ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttShow definition »ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttName /typettttttttttDescription /examplettttttttttConstraintstttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttstatusttttttttttttstring

get.summary: CloudFlare security header for a zone
get.description: CloudFlare security header for a zone

patch.summary: CloudFlare security header for a zone
patch.description: CloudFlare security header for a zone

parameters.name: include_subdomains
parameters.description: Include all subdomains for strict transport securitytttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttrue

parameters.name: max_age
parameters.description: Max age in seconds of the strict transport securitytttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt86400

parameters.name: nosniff
parameters.description: Whether or not to include X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff headertttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttrue

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: {strict_transport_security:{enabled:true,max_age:86400,include_subdomains:true,nosniff:true}}ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttShow definition »ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttName /typettttttttttDescription /examplettttttttttConstraintstttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttstrict_transport_securityttttttttttttobject
